entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet tools are not able to work with process which is running under tmux #33044
  • GenAPI generates incorrect class declarations for VB authored classes with extension methods #33042
  • Add support for podman credentials by using Valleysoft.DockerCredsProvider 2.2.0 #33034
  • dotnet tool run <TOOL_NAME> doesn't work on Linux #33030

Closed

  • .Net7 dotnet watch regression: Failed to create MSBuildWorkspace for *.fsproj #28998
  • BinaryFormatter is disabled in WinForms or WPF projects in preview6 #32941

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't run helix tests if the build fails #33045
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add GarbageCollectionAdaptationMode msbuild property #33043
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Improve warning message for ILLink runtime pack #33041
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Remove DynamicCodeSupport default from SDK #33040
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Add dependencies needed for source-build PVP flow #33039
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Update ValleySoft.DockerCredsProvider to get better support for podman authentication #33038
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [WIP] Add support for starting the application through CMD (instead of ENTRYPOINT). #33037
    untriaged
  • PackageValidation compare TargetFrameworkInformation instead of TargetFramework property directly #33036
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • Do not fail dotnet watch on workspace errors #33006
    untriaged
  • Do not fail dotnet watch on workspace errors #33005
    untriaged
  • [port to main] Explicitly enable BF for WinForms and WPF in Microsoft.NET.Sdk.targets #33004
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2194098 #33025
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Log success or error only for error suppressions #33031
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.3.0 to 20.3.1 in /eng/dependabot #33028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.3.0 to 20.3.1 in /eng/dependabot #33027
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Updated

  • [Containers] Fix registry operations that use chunks and various resiliency enhancements #33019
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Set PlatformName and other properties early enough in outer build #33003
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Startup race condition #33007
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable error when using BinaryFormatter in GenerateResource #32981
    untriaged
  • Enable some F# tests #16020
    Area-FSharp
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32975
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • New: Add the ability to run concurrent client connections #16048
    Area-Watch
  • Add zsh compdef completion script. #14239
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #32730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.14.1 to 20.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #32713
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • For templating#3553. Make search results downloads column optional #33024
    untriaged
